attachments.title: Home Automation with Raspberry Pi and Arduino
attachments.text: We've talked about the relative merits of Arduino and Raspberry Pi before - they each have their strengths. They needn't be an either or choice though - combine them to get the best of both worlds. Home automation is the perfect candidate for this. The home automation market is flooded with expensive consumer systems, incompatible…
